## Reading data set

```{r}
DM.dt <- fread(file.path("dataset.csv"))
DM <- DM.dt[,.(X1,X2,X3,Y)]
head(DM)

```

```{r}
do.call(cbind, lapply(DM, summary))
```

```{r}
DM_Matrix<-as.matrix(DM)
rcorr(DM_Matrix, type=c("pearson","spearman"))
```

```{r}
pairs(~X1+X2+X3+Y , data=DM , main = "Scatter Matrix")
```
